text.__SUMMARY__: Oscilla tornata is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The length of the shell measures 3 mm.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
Northwest Atlantic from North Carolina to the Florida Keys at depths between 27 m and 260 m.
